title: Strengthening App Development Competencies in Practice: Mobile Microlearning for Improving Colonoscopy Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: One can explain the six core competencies required for performing colonoscopy (clinical knowledge, equipment manipulation, situational awareness, strategic planning, clinical reasoning, and interpersonal skills).
Through colonoscopy simulation content, one can apply key technical skills for each actual procedure with 80% accuracy.
By utilizing a real-time feedback system, one can self-diagnose their performance capabilities and develop improvement plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
